1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.1.0: The attack speed configuration now supports 1.10 and 1.11.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.0.0:
The default gamerules JSON is now reformatted every time it is read.
Attack speeds are now configurable for each item.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.0.0:
Added default difficulties.
Fixed string gamerules.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.2.1: Fixed crashes relating to the switch to Jankson.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.2.0: Switched to Jankson for JSON processing.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0.5: Forced gamerules are now forcibly set after a world has already been created.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0.4: Fixed all default gamerules being forced.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0.3: Fixed invalid information in the default default gamerules.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0.0:
Added default config versions.
Added default gamerules.
